capability.name: Branch Portfolio
capability.definition: Evaluate coverage and relative performance of branches. Optimize product allocation and marketing activity across the available branch network
capability.role: Evaluate coverage and relative performance of branches. Optimize product allocation and marketing activity across the available branch network.
capability.example: Business strategists assemble and review the distribution and relative product performance across the network and adjust the allocation accordingly

key_features.name: Branch network analysis and evaluation
key_features.description: Enables branch network analysis and evaluation to support evaluate coverage and relative performance of branches

key_features.name: Product allocation optimization
key_features.description: Enables product allocation optimization to support evaluate coverage and relative performance of branches

key_features.name: Marketing activity optimization across branch network
key_features.description: Enables marketing activity optimization across branch network to support evaluate coverage and relative performance of branches

key_features.name: Performance comparison and coverage assessment
key_features.description: Enables performance comparison and coverage assessment to support evaluate coverage and relative performance of branches
